name: gittop-api
description: Easy to use API for getting information about the most popular repositories on GitHub

scripts.start_cli_client:sync_now: npm run build && node build/cli-client/index.js syncnow
scripts.start_cli_client:get_gitignore_repo: npm run build && node build/cli-client/index.js get repo gitignore
scripts.start_cli_client:get_linux_repo: npm run build && node build/cli-client/index.js get repo linux
scripts.start_cli_client:get_invalid_repo: npm run build && node build/cli-client/index.js get repo invalid
scripts.start_cli_client:get_repos_second_page: npm run build && node build/cli-client/index.js get repos 1
scripts.start_cli_client:get_repos_out_of_bounds: npm run build && node build/cli-client/index.js get repos 999

author: Arataki Leo
